subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson, who traditionally practices away from the site of a championship on its eve, played a round at Baltusrol Golf Club in Springfield, N.J., where he won the P.G.A. Championship last year.
snippet: Phil Mickelson, who traditionally practices away from the site of a championship on its eve, played a round at Baltusrol Golf Club in Springfield, N.J., where he won the P.G.A. Championship last year.
